column4: I need a suggestion, my old site used Postnuke which i loved however thats now depricated. And my host allows others like PhpBB, Drupal, Joomla. I wanted to use Zikula but could not any suggestions on what is similar in look and ease to Postnuke was?
There are many, have you looked at Dans?
mauren tail -f /var/log/name-of-log  should allow you to see
looked at a few others but the host lets certain apps and not others. I really wanted Zikula but no interface for it or I did something wrong (It was late afterall) lol
Are you blocking content or is that the intent?
I am not blocking anything to be honest, its a BSD based webhost and they install nothing as its pay as you go.
I see now, was just looking at the site, Blogging?
I like the host as its no frills, you pay only for what bandwidth/storage you use not a flat fee permonth type thing. Just a bugger to setup lol
Do you have alien marked in the Package Manager?
give you a better idea here is a link to my old site in the internet time machine http://web.archive.org/web/20030217033734/http://linuxmonster.org/ takes a minute or so to load
Okay maybe it takes 4 mins to load lol
Something like Bluefish or am missing the track here?
you saw the archive of the site?
takes like 4 mins to load as its a archive of the website 7 years ago lol
That is what had me puzzled...

I think I will just try Zikula again even though they dont support it. If the host allows Drupal and Joomla then I cant see why Zikula would not work. I must have just been tired and missed something lastnight playing around
We are getting rather off topic now, /msg me
